function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to changes in demand patterns and movement restrictions","Impact":"Potential for a surge in contagious disease transmission if movement restrictions are lifted and demand patterns return to normal","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, maintain movement restrictions as needed, and promote remote working and virtual meetings","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote work technology, virtual meeting platforms","People":"General public, workers, travelers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, employers"},{"Description":"Erosion of energy institutions and policy frameworks due to the impact of the pandemic","Impact":"Disruption of energy institutions and policy frameworks could lead to inefficiencies and instability in the energy sector","Mitigation":"Strengthening and adapting energy institutions and policies to address the challenges posed by the pandemic","Technologies":"Data analytics, digital platforms for policy communication, remote monitoring systems","People":"Energy policy makers, regulators, energy sector stakeholders","Owner":"Energy ministries, regulatory bodies, energy companies"},{"Description":"Pronounced effect on institutions and policy frameworks in Africa despite lower infection rates","Impact":"Potential for strain on healthcare systems and public health infrastructure due to the impact of the pandemic on institutions and policy frameworks","Mitigation":"Strengthening healthcare systems, implementing strict public health measures, and adapting policies to address the unique challenges in Africa","Technologies":"Telemedicine, digital health records, public health information systems","People":"Healthcare workers, policymakers, general public in Africa","Owner":"Health ministries, international organizations, policymakers"}]}
